name: Brown_Bonded_Leather_Reclining_Loveseat
description: The left and right facing reclining seats joined together instantly creates a loveseat. Upholstered in classic brown bonded leather with a comfortably padded head rest, excellent lumbar support and a reclining mechanism, this seat will be the perfect addition to any room. A plush seat back and sleek track arms give this loveseat a chic modern look that is sure to enhance your living space. Ideal for movie night, reading a book or just to kick back and relax after a long day’s work, this modular motion series was designed for ultimate comfort. Includes: One (1) loveseatFurniture Pattern: SolidType: Loveseat, ReclinerMaterial: Bonded Leather, Foam, WoodStyle: Contemporary, Casual, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: BrownDimensions: 41 inches high x 52 inches wide x 35 inches deepStyleCasual, Contemporary, TransitionalMaterialBonded Leather, Foam, WoodTypeLoveseat, ReclinerAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
